jobDescription:
Perusahaan Alamme berlokasi di Bandung Kulon, Bandung, Jawa Barat, Indonesia, adalah sebuah perusahaan yang terus berkembang dengan fokus pada inovasi dan teknologi. Dengan visi untuk menjadi pionir dalam industri ini, Alamme mencari tenaga kerja yang berbakat dan berdedikasi tinggi untuk mengisi posisi Admin Gudang Internship. Kami percaya bahwa setiap anggota tim kami memiliki peran penting kami berharapyek-proyek menarik dan tantangan yang besar dapat bergabung dengan kami.

di Alamme, Anda akan bertanggung jawab atas manajemen data dan operasional gudang. Tugas-tugas utama Anda termasuk merok barang, serta mendukung proses logistik dan distribusi. Anda juga akan membantu dalam pengelolaan data gudang menggunakan berbagai sistem database seperti MySQL, PostgreSQL, Microsoft Excel, SQL, Microsoft SQL Server, dan Oracle Database. Keterampilan ini akan sangat bermanfaat dalam menjaga efisiensi operasional dan mendukung keputusan bisnis yang lebih baik.

Persyaratan utama untuk posisi ini adalah sebagai berikut:

- Lokasi kantor berada di Bandung Kulon, Bandung, Jawa Barat, Indonesia.

- Kandidat harus laki-laki.

- Pendidikan minimal SMA/SMK.

- Pengalaman kerja antara 1 hingga 3 tahun.

- Memiliki kemampuan lingkungan kerja yang positif, peluang belajar, dan dukungan profesional bagi para pekerja kami. Kami menantikan kandidat yang bersemangat dan siap untuk berkontribusi dalam pertumbuhan perusahaan kami. Jika Anda tertarik, silakan kirimkan lamaran lengkap dengan CV dan surat lamaran ke alamat email yang sesuai dengan perekrutan kami.

Kualifikasi

  • Pendidikan Minimal S1, Diutamakan Informatika
  • Mampu melakukan pengolahan data
  • Menguasai MS. Office dan Software pengolahan data
  • Bisa bekerjasama dalam tim, jujur, loyal, dan konsisten
  • Memiliki SIM A lebih diminati

Tanggung Jawab Utama

  1. Membangun dan mengelola workflow otomatisasi menggunakan n8n yang modular, stabil, dan reusable.
  2. Melakukan integrasi API dengan tools seperti OpenAI, Notion, Google Sheets, serta sistem internal lainnya.
  3. Menyusun automation pipeline berdasarkan kebutuhan tim, dengan pendekatan logis dan efisien.
  4. Melakukan debugging dan troubleshooting terhadap workflow yang berjalan tidak optimal.
  5. Menyusun dokumentasi lengkap untuk tiap alur automasi agar dapat digunakan oleh tim lainnya.
  6. Berkolaborasi erat dengan tim konten dan backend dalam mengorkestrasi alur kerja lintas fungsi.
  7. Berkontribusi dalam eksplorasi dan eksekusi AI-powered automation yang relevan dan berdampak.

AI Developer memiliki jobrole dalam pengembangan fitur AI pada platform secara end to end. Adapun preferensi skill set seperti dibawah ini :

Pemrograman dengan Python/ Other Programming Language

Bahasa pemrograman utama dalam pengembangan AI, digunakan untuk menulis kode dan membangun model Machine Learning serta Deep Learning.

Machine Learning dan Deep Learning

Memahami konsep jaringan saraf, algoritma regresi, serta framework seperti TensorFlow dan PyTorch untuk membangun model AI.

Natural Language Processing (NLP)

Digunakan untuk membangun chatbot AI, analisis sentimen, dan pemrosesan teks secara otomatis.

Computer Vision

Memproses dan menganalisis gambar serta video untuk aplikasi seperti pengenalan wajah dan deteksi objek.

Data Analytics dan Cloud Computing

Memahami analisis data dan memanfaatkan layanan Google Cloud atau AWS untuk mendukung pengembangan AI berbasis cloud.

Company Description

MSBU Konsultan Indonesia, founded in 2019, specializes in on-demand IT staffing and recruitment services. We stand out due to our SLA commitment, client and candidate success orientation, and a recruitment model powered by a Crowdsourcing Ecosystem. We have a proven track record in filling challenging IT positions for startups and enterprise clients. Our expertise spans Software, Mobile, Data, Infrastructure, Cybersecurity Product + UX, and Functional areas, leading to high client and candidate satisfaction. We also created the Freelance Tech Recruiter Community (FRC), a vibrant ecosystem connecting over 250 tech recruiters who meet, learn, and earn rewards.

Role Description

This is a full-time remote role for an AI Engineer at MSBU Group. The AI Engineer will develop, test, and deploy machine learning models, design AI frameworks, and collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate AI solutions. Daily tasks will include data preprocessing, feature engineering, model training, and evaluation. Additionally, the AI Engineer will work on optimizing model performance and scalability, staying updated with the latest AI trends and advancements.

Qualifications

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field
  • Proficiency in programming languages such as Python.
  • Hands-on experience with REST APIs, Webhooks, and related backend technologies.
  • Familiarity with integrating AI APIs and working with LLMs (Large Language Models).
  • Experience using AI workflow automation platforms like n8n.io, Dify.ai, or equivalents.
  • Passionate about AI and actively follow developments in the AI ecosystem.
  • Experience in Data Analysis, Data Engineering, or Data Science is a strong advantage, though not mandatory.
  • Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced, tech-driven environment.

Deskripsi Singkat Pekerjaan (Job Summary)

AI Engineer bertanggung jawab untuk membangun, melatih, dan menerapkan model kecerdasan buatan (AI) dalam produk dan proses bisnis perusahaan. Peran ini mencakup riset teknis, pengembangan model machine learning atau deep learning, serta integrasi ke dalam sistem produksi.

Kualifikasi (Qualifications)

â€¢\tSertifikasi seperti Google Cloud ML Engineer, TensorFlow Developer, atau lainnya adalah nilai tambah.

Pengalaman:

â€¢\tFresh graduate dengan portofolio kuat dipertimbangkan.

â€¢\tUntuk level mid-senior: 2â€“5 tahun pengalaman dalam pengembangan model AI/ML.

You will design and develop AI-driven chatbots capable of natural language understanding (NLU), contextual awareness, and dynamic, actionable follow-up. Your work will empower automated systems that can check payment , create an user id for successful payment, book meetings, escalate issues, provide personalized recommendations, and seamlessly integrate into broader business workflows.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Design and implement conversational AI models with contextual understanding and memory.
  • Develop smart chatbot features, including intent recognition, filling, and proactive follow-ups.
  • Integrate bots with APIs, CRMs, scheduling tools, and other enterprise systems to trigger actions based on conversations.
  • Train, fine-tune, and evaluate LLMs or NLP models to improve user engagement and conversation quality.
  • Continuously monitor and optimize chatbot performance using real-time analytics and feedback loops.

Requirements:

  • Bachelor's or Master's in AI, Computer Science, Data Science, or related field.
  • 2+ years of hands-on experience building chatbot or virtual assistant systems.
  • Strong understanding of LLMs, NLP pipelines, conversational context, and dialogue management.
  • Experience with API integration and building end-to-end systems that drive real-world actions.
  • Familiarity with chatbot UX and human-in-the-loop design patterns.
  • Solid communication skills and ability to work cross-functionally.

On behalf our client, a wellknown Technology companyt, we're looking for a hands-on AI Engineer to help design and deploy AI-native applications that elevate telemedicine and homecare experiences. This role combines AI development, workflow automation, and full-stack deployment with a focus on intelligent, user-centric tools powered by large language models (LLMs).

Key Responsibilities

  • Design and implement AI chatbots and intelligent agents using LLM frameworks (e.g., n8n, LangChain, OpenAI API)
  • Build AI-native apps using Next.js and low-code platforms like n8n or AI Studio
  • Optimize and refine prompt engineering, workflows, and user interaction
  • Integrate RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) systems using vector databases (e.g., Pinecone, Weaviate, Qdrant)
  • Develop and maintain AI workflows, APIs, and real-time automation
  • Collaborate cross-functionally to prototype, iterate, and deploy features
  • Deploy applications on platforms like Vercel, GCP, AWS, or Firebase
  • Monitor and continuously improve AI systems post-deployment

Required Skills & Experience

  • Minimum Qualifications:
  • 2+ years in AI or automation engineering
  • Proficiency in Python and AI libraries (OpenAI, LangChain, Hugging Face)
  • Experience with low-code tools (e.g., n8n, Make.com)
  • Familiarity with full-stack development (Next.js)
  • Cloud deployment experience using APIs, webhooks, etc.

Preferred Qualifications:

  • Built AI chatbots, NLP tools, or medical recommendation systems
  • Familiar with vector DBs and RAG-based solutions
  • Comfortable with Git workflows, CI/CD, and MLOps principles

Tools & Tech Stack

  • Languages & Frameworks: Python, JavaScript/TypeScript, Next.js
  • AI & Automation: OpenAI API, LangChain, n8n, AI Studio
  • Hosting: Vercel, GCP, AWS
  • Databases: PostgreSQL, Supabase, Pinecone (or other vector DBs)
  • DevOps: Git, Docker, Postman

Culture Fit

  • Motivated to drive impact in the healthcare space
  • Enjoys prototyping, fast iterations, and solving real-world problems
  • Comfortable working in hybrid or remote cross-functional teams

Responsibilities:

Implement Deep Learning to solve various use cases such as Natural Language Processing (NLP), Computer Vision, and Speech Recognition.

Extract patterns from unstructured data (text, images, audio), formulate hypotheses, and perform data labeling as needed.

Utilize Spark and other data processing frameworks to perform large-scale feature engineering.

Design and develop AI/ML models tailored to project requirements and convert them into APIs consumable by other applications.

Collaborate with Business Analysts, Product Managers, and other business stakeholders.

Identify new use cases and explore emerging technologies that can be applied to support and enhance business processes.

Required Qualifications:

Bachelor's, Master's, or PhD degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Engineering, Mathematics, Physics, or a related field.

Minimum 3 years of experience as a Data Scientist or AI Engineer.

At least 2 years of experience developing end-to-end AI solutions, including version control, model scaling, and monitoring.

Hands-on experience working with unstructured data, especially in NLP (mandatory); experience in Computer Vision and Speech Recognition is a plus.

Experience in various NLP use cases, such as:

Chatbots

Sentiment analysis

Spam detection

Topic modeling

Complaint analysis, etc.

Proficient with tools and frameworks such as:

Python, PySpark, TensorFlow/PyTorch, Golang, NestJS or ReactJS

Strong data analytics skills using:

SQL, Presto, Spark, Pandas, Python

Familiarity with cloud services such as the AWS suite

jobTitle: Android Developer (Kotlin) - Prefer ASAP / WFO Sudirman
jobDescription:
Sigmatech â€“ Your Digital Growth Solution Partner! We're hiring!

On behalf of our client, we are currently hiring for a position as detailed below:

Android Developer - Kotlin (WFO Sudirman, Central Jakarta)

Job Description:

  • Develop and maintain large-scale Android applications using Kotlin with clean architecture and efficient coding practices.
  • Implement secure and scalable data handling using Room, SharedPreferences, and DataStore.
  • Integrate remote services through REST API or GraphQL using Retrofit, OkHttp, or Ktor.
  • Optimize application performance using Android Profiler, memory management, and network tools like Logcat and Charles Proxy.
  • Collaborate with DevOps for CI/CD automation (GitHub Actions, Jenkins) and cloud integration (GCP, AWS, Azure).

Qualifications:

  • Bachelorâ€™s degree in Informatics, Computer Science, or a related field.
  • Minimum 3-5 years of experience in Android development with high-traffic and large-user applications.
  • Strong proficiency in Kotlin, Object-Oriented Programming (OOP), and asynchronous programming using Coroutines.
  • Experienced with Firebase services (Firestore, Crashlytics, FCM) and implementing secure authentication (SSL Pinning, OAuth2).
  • Skilled in testing using JUnit, Espresso, and Mockito, with a deep understanding of debugging tools.

Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted. Thank you.
